LanguageData.HC_Owlbear.label: Owlbear
LanguageData.HC_Owlbear.description: A creature with an owl-like face and the body of a giant bear, similar to a large bear, but more intimidating due to its powerful beak and jaw power.
LanguageData.HC_Owlbear.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.HC_Owlbear.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.HC_Owlbear.tools.2.label: beak
LanguageData.HC_Owlbear.tools.3.label: head
